title: Space Camp
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,418 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1050L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and V
description: Imagine being an astronaut and blasting off into outer space . . . that's the dream of many students who attend space camp each summer! Space Camp gives students a glimpse into these amazing camps and the experiences they have to offer. Detailed information and helpful graphics will keep students engaged with this exciting topic. This book can also be used to teach students how to summarize a text as well as to identify the main idea and details to better understand the information. The book and lesson are also available for levels S and V.
meta: aeronautics, aviation, counselors, exploration, g's, hone, mock, rovers, simulated, spacecraft, technology, trainees
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Subject-Verb Agreement : Use correct subject-verb agreement in sentences
Homographs : Identify and use homographs correctly

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
